isis.stitle: TSI 03-13-01R - Oil Change Intervals For Eaton Transmissions and Dana Spicer Drive Axles Using Roadranger E250 and E500 Extended Drain Lubricants

subjectgroup.subject: Oil Change Intervals For Eaton Transmissions and Dana Spicer Drive Axles Using Roadranger E250 and E500 Extended Drain Lubricants

geninfo.para: Roadranger offers Approved Extended Drain Lubricants for usage in both transmissions and rear drive axles. Please refer to the pdf for this TSI for the Roadranger Information Bulletin TMIB-0130 which defines "Service Fill" and "Factory Fill" and explains drain intervals associated with E250 and E500 Extended Drain Lubricants. It also explains the requirements for changing from petroleum-based lubricants to Approved Extended Drain Lubricants.
